description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant me +1|+0 for each <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> ally in play.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant me +1|+0 for each Ephemeral ally in play.
flavorText: In death, as in life, he bellows the twisted, dark command. And in death, as in life, Hecarim's loyal knights answer, charging forth to slaughter.
name: Iron Harbinger
